dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so listen to this – 3 hours and 55 minutes. That's the current train travel time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so listen to this - three hours and fifty five minutes. That's the current train travel time.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The travel time is 3 hours and 55 minutes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, what?! Almost four hours? For that route?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, what?! Almost four hours? For that route?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Astana to Karaganda. And people, like, have been waiting forever for new trains there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Astana to Karaganda. And people, like, have been waiting forever for new trains there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstanis have long been waiting for good news about new trains between Astana and Karaganda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, exactly! You'd think, um, a high-speed electric one would totally cut that down, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, exactly! You'd think, um, a high-speed electric one would totally cut that down, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A reader actually asked if it could be, uh, two hours. That's what they want.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A reader actually asked if it could be, uh, two hours. That's what they want.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A reader reached out to our editorial team, asking whether a high-speed electric train will be launched between the two cities. "It would be great if the train could cover this distance in just two hours. Is such an option expected in the near future?" she inquired.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Two hours! Oh, absolutely. That’s what you expect in, like, any modern system.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Two hours! Oh, absolutely. That's what you expect in, like, any modern system.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And the company, "Passenger Transportation," they even said it's one of their "priority directions."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the company, Passenger Transportation, they even said it's one of their priority directions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The company noted that the Astana"Karaganda route is one of its priority directions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Priority? Okay, great. So what's the massive upgrade then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Priority? Okay, great. So what's the massive upgrade then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They, uh, they said reducing the journey to two hours? Not planned in the near future.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They, uh, they said reducing the journey to two hours? Not planned in the near future.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Reducing the journey to 2 hours is not planned in the near future," the company stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thus, a high-speed alternative on this route is not expected anytime soon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, man. So all that waiting, all that talk about "priority," it's just... nothing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, man. So all that waiting, all that talk about priority, it's just... nothing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. Just, "Hey, we've got these two electric trains that take four hours."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. Just, Hey, we've got these two electric trains that take four hours.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For passengers' convenience, two electric trains currently operate on this route: No. 7556 and No. 6858, running between Astana and Karaganda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ugh. That's gotta be, like, super frustrating for everyone who uses that line.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ugh. That's gotta be, like, super frustrating for everyone who uses that line.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly. And, um, they've been asking about Astana to Almaty too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly. And, um, they've been asking about Astana to Almaty too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Tengrinews.kz also inquired about a new high-speed route in the direction of Astana - Almaty.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I bet. Sounds like a trend, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I bet. Sounds like a trend, honestly.
